data.lyric:
[ti:Why Can't I Change]
[ar:Passenger]
[al:Why Can't I Change]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Why Can't I Change - Passenger
[00:04.39]Lyricist：Mike Rosenberg
[00:08.78]Composer：Mike Rosenberg
[00:13.17]Producer：Chris Vallejo/Mike Rosenberg
[00:17.57]Why can't I change after all these years
[00:25.36]Why can't I change my ways
[00:32.94]I find it so strange after all these years
[00:41.24]I'm still more or less the same
[00:48.50]Wherever I go whatever I do whatever I know
[00:56.79]It just comes and goes so soon
[01:04.16]Whatever life brings whatever song it sings
[01:12.14]I'm still whistling the same old tune
[01:20.01]Why can't I change after all these years
[01:27.80]Why can't I change my ways
[01:35.35]I find it so strange after all these years
[01:43.54]I'm still more or less the same
[01:50.90]Whoever I'm with whatever I take whatever I give
[01:59.20]I'm still running in the same old races
[02:06.56]Whatever choice I make whatever road I take
[02:14.38]But I still wind up in the same old place
[02:20.68]So why why can't I change
[02:23.89]Why can't I change after all these years
[02:30.14]Why can't I change my ways
[02:35.34]Why can't I change my ways
[02:36.55]Oh I find it so strange after all these years
[02:46.10]I'm still more or less the same
[02:50.97]I'm more or less the same
[02:53.89]Yeah yeah
[02:55.84]Yeah yeah
[02:58.71]I'm more or less the same
[03:01.75]Yeah yeah
[03:03.67]Yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Why Can't I Change]
[ar:Passenger]
[al:Why Can't I Change]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.39]//
[00:08.78]//
[00:13.17]//
[00:17.57]这些年过后 为何我还不能改变
[00:25.36]为何我不能改变我的生活方式
[00:32.94]这些年过后 我发现一切都如此陌生
[00:41.24]而我却没多大改变
[00:48.50]无论我去哪儿 做什么
[00:56.79]我都知道 这些来得快去的也快
[01:04.16]无论生活变成什么模样 是悲是喜
[01:12.14]我还是按着从前的节奏
[01:20.01]这些年过后 为何我还不能改变
[01:27.80]为何我不能改变我的生活方式
[01:35.35]这些年过后 我发现一切都如此陌生
[01:43.54]而我却没多大改变
[01:50.90]无论与谁在一起 得到什么 付出什么
[01:59.20]我还是会重蹈覆辙
[02:06.56]无论我作何选择
[02:14.38]我总是在原地徘徊
[02:20.68]这些年过后 为何我还不能改变
[02:23.89]为何我不能改变我的生活方式
[02:30.14]为何我不能改变我的生活方式
[02:35.34]为何我不能改变我的生活方式
[02:36.55]这些年过后 我发现一切都如此陌生
[02:46.10]而我却没多大改变
[02:50.97]而我却没多大改变
[02:53.89]//
[02:55.84]//
[02:58.71]而我却没多大改变
[03:01.75]//
[03:03.67]//
